name: Boundary Consul Healthcheck Plugin
description: Queries Consul health checks and returns events to Boundary on a status change of a given health check.

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval (sec)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: The Poll Interval to call your endpoint in seconds. Ex. 30

paramSchema.title: Detailed Info
paramSchema.name: detailedInfo
paramSchema.description: (optional) Set to true to display additional info on passing health checks  (default = not set i.e. false)
